query-mapping.description: List of images used by wiki pages

class.name: AWA.Wikis.Models.Wiki_Image_Info
class.comment: The information about an image used in a wiki page.

query.name: wiki-image-get-data
query.comment: Get the data content of the Wiki image (original image).
query.sql: SELECT store.mime_type, store.create_date, store.uri, store.storage, 0, 0, data.data FROM awa_storage AS store INNER JOIN awa_wiki_space AS wiki LEFT JOIN awa_acl AS acl ON acl.entity_id = wiki.workspace_id AND acl.entity_type = :table AND acl.user_id = :user_id LEFT JOIN awa_storage_data AS data ON store.store_data_id = data.id WHERE store.id = :store_id AND wiki.id = :wiki_id AND (wiki.is_public OR NOT acl.id IS NULL)

query.name: wiki-image-width-get-data
query.comment: Get the data content of the Wiki image for an image with a given width.
query.sql: SELECT store.mime_type, store.create_date, store.uri, store.storage, image.width, image.height, data.data FROM awa_image AS image INNER JOIN awa_storage AS store ON image.storage_id = store.id INNER JOIN awa_wiki_space AS wiki ON store.workspace_id = wiki.workspace_id AND wiki.id = :wiki_id LEFT JOIN awa_acl AS acl ON acl.entity_id = wiki.workspace_id AND acl.entity_type = :table AND acl.user_id = :user_id LEFT JOIN awa_storage_data AS data ON store.store_data_id = data.id WHERE (wiki.is_public OR NOT acl.id IS NULL) AND ((store.original_id = :store_id AND image.width = :width) OR store.id = :store_id) ORDER BY store.id DESC LIMIT 1

query.name: wiki-image-height-get-data
query.comment: Get the data content of the Wiki image for an image with a given height.
query.sql: SELECT store.mime_type, store.create_date, store.uri, store.storage, image.width, image.height, data.data FROM awa_image AS image INNER JOIN awa_storage AS store ON image.storage_id = store.id INNER JOIN awa_wiki_space AS wiki ON store.workspace_id = wiki.workspace_id AND wiki.id = :wiki_id LEFT JOIN awa_acl AS acl ON acl.entity_id = wiki.workspace_id AND acl.entity_type = :table AND acl.user_id = :user_id LEFT JOIN awa_storage_data AS data ON store.store_data_id = data.id WHERE (wiki.is_public OR NOT acl.id IS NULL) AND ((store.original_id = :store_id AND image.height = :height) OR store.id = :store_id) ORDER BY store.id DESC LIMIT 1
